fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.activation

Interface IService<S>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - the service type, expected to be an interface type used for registering the service instance in the OSGi service registry.

    public interface IService<S>
    Defines a typed service, with optional OSGi service filter properties.

    Thread safety: implementations are required to be immutable.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    REFLEXE Technologies
    See Also:
    IServiceContext.defineService(Class)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Class<S> getType()
      Gets the service implementation type.
      Filter toFilter()
      Gets this service as an OSGi filter.
      IService<S> with(String key, int value)
      Derives a new typed service definition, with an additional service registration property filter.
      IService<S> with(String key, long value)
      Derives a new typed service definition, with an additional service registration property filter.
      IService<S> with(String key, String value)
      Derives a new typed service definition, with an additional service registration property filter.

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        Class<S> getType()
        Gets the service implementation type.
        Returns:
        the implementation type.
        Since:
        1.0

      • toFilter

        Filter toFilter()
        Gets this service as an OSGi filter.
        Returns:
        this service as a filter.
        Since:
        1.0

      • with

        IService<S> with(String key,
                 String value)
          throws IllegalArgumentException
        Derives a new typed service definition, with an additional service registration property filter. Invoking this method does not modify the current instance; the current instance is immutable.
        Parameters:
        key - the service registration property name.
        value - the service registration property value.
        Returns:
        a new definition, derived from the current definition.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if either the key or the value are invalid, or if a conflicting filter exists for the specified key.
        Since:
        1.0

      • with

        IService<S> with(String key,
                 int value)
          throws IllegalArgumentException
        Derives a new typed service definition, with an additional service registration property filter. Invoking this method does not modify the current instance; the current instance is immutable.
        Parameters:
        key - the service registration property name.
        value - the service registration property value.
        Returns:
        a new definition, derived from the current definition.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if either the key or the value are invalid, or if a conflicting filter exists for the specified key.
        Since:
        1.0

      • with

        IService<S> with(String key,
                 long value)
          throws IllegalArgumentException
        Derives a new typed service definition, with an additional service registration property filter. Invoking this method does not modify the current instance; the current instance is immutable.
        Parameters:
        key - the service registration property name.
        value - the service registration property value.
        Returns:
        a new definition, derived from the current definition.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if property-based filtering is not supported for the service type.
        IllegalArgumentException - if either the key or the value are invalid, or if a conflicting filter exists for the specified key.
        Since:
        1.0
